items.text: punched wide of the bowler to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, 1 run

items.preText: It has gone overcast suddenly. Pretty sure it isn't my LED screen acting up
items.text: makes room and punches this to extra cover.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, no run

items.preText: Saifuddin to bowl his second over, replacing his skipper
items.text: extra bounce off the deck, nips back in too, bunted to midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to du Plessis, no run

items.preText: Sandeep Jalda: "I'm little late in catching up. 1. Why didn't Ngidi complete his quota? 2. What's with SA's jersey colour?" -- Ngidi injured his left hamstring and hobbled off in the 7th over. This is SA's 'away' jersey
items.text: tucks this into the leg side for an easy single
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: punches this slower delivery to long-on
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Markram, 1 run

items.text: tremendous use of the bottom hand as he stands tall and punches this on the up through extra cover. Top shot
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to du Plessis, FOUR runs

items.text: works this incoming short of length delivery to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: balance perfect as he whips this down to long-on
items.postText: It's time for drinks. Has all the makings of a tight finish. South Africa have recovered well, and while the progress has been a tad slow, they're very much in the contest. Alex Malcolm is ready to jump back in with the controls even as it nears ticks closer to 1am in Melbourne.
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Markram, 1 run

items.preText: Thanks Shashank. You get the feeling this chase is about to get interesting with the rebuild established following de Kock's fall. Mosaddek into the attack
items.text: flatter off break on leg, he punches straight to midwicket
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Markram, no run

items.text: flatter and straighter, he tries to punch on the up to long on but midwicket cuts it off
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Markram, no run

items.text: fuller on middle, driven firmly to long this time
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Markram, 1 run

items.text: slower on leg, no turn, he's back and wheeling this to deep forward square
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to du Plessis, 1 run

items.preText: 50 partnership has come up between this pair
items.text: fuller, he drives back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Markram, no run

items.text: he charges early to a ball darted into leg, he whips this through square leg
items.postText: 100 up for South Africa. ESPNcricinfo's Forecaster rates SA's win probability at the end of the drinks break at 37.92%.
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Markram, 1 run

items.preText: Shakib Al Hasan back into the attack
items.text: looped up outside off, he punches to point but the skipper makes a superb diving stop
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, no run

items.text: slower on off, he sits back and forces this firmly to long off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, 1 run

items.text: good length, hint of turn, he punches on the up to long off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: Bowled him! 250 wickets for Shakib and this was a beauty! He flighted this but undercut it a touch, Markram played back expecting it to grip and sit up, it zipped on with the arm, went through the gate, crashed into middle and leg!
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Markram, OUT

dismissal.text: AK Markram  b Shakib Al Hasan 45 (78m 56b 4x4 0x6) SR: 80.35

items.preText: David Miller in at No.4 after missing the game against England. Slip in place
items.text: tossed up, he shuffles out and drives to long on
items.postText: Joynul: "Shakib becomes the fastest to reach the milestones of 250 wicket and 5000 runs club, beating some of the biggest name in the game by some mergin. What a champion " Superstar
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Miller, 1 run

items.text: drifting into leg, he is back and nudging this to midwicket to pinch a tight one, Mehidy swoops but tried throw as he was diving and collecting and sprayed the throw miles wide of the keeper and concedes another run!
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to du Plessis, 2 runs

items.preText: Mehidy has gone off the ground after that fielding mishap. He was limping. Will update you when we get some information. He may have banged his knee
items.text: shorter, he's back and punching to deep cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, 1 run

items.text: darted way down the leg side and Mushfiqur can't glove it as it spins further down leg! Five wides
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to du Plessis, 5 wides

items.text: darted into leg stump, he's back and working this through forward square
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to du Plessis, 1 run

items.text: drifting into leg, he's back and glancing this to short fine
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, no run

items.text: full toss, he just drives with a bottom hand punch to long off
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Miller, 1 run
